summary: Simple txt. When run from console gives all shouts, spells, items, and more.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]http://nachosconqueso.com.ar/images/header.jpg[/img]
[size=18]Nnachos TXT Complete character[/size][/center]

This file is intended for those who don\'t know how/are lazy to search how to achieve this.

This is a simpel txt that, when run from console, gives you:



[size=16][b]Features:[/b][/size]

[list]

[*]All shouts

[*]All spells

[*]100000000000 health, magicka and stamina.

[*]All skills at 100 whith all perks.

[*]100 dragon souls.

[*]999999 gold

[*]0 seconds shout cooldown

[/list]

[size=16][b]Instructions[/b][/size]

Simply paste in Skyrim\'s root directory as a .txt.
Run the game, open the console and type:

[b]bat nnachostxt[/b]


Hope this helps.
author: Nnachos
